body: Many of you best know me from walls, play other games time from time, decided to join the forums because of the people I've came to know in this server. What makes this server different from others is the creative maps and the close knit community surrounded.  I plan on TRYING to make walls map(if i can even learn how to simply build a house!) but I'll probably get some help by some better walls map making experts. And I'll give plenty of discussions also!
